step_data.thought: I've already clicked on the CONTENT link which has opened the dropdown menu. Now I can see the Widgets link is available in the Elements section of this dropdown menu. The Widgets link has BID 322. I should click on this link to navigate to the Widgets section where dynamic content elements can be managed.
